title: Discouraging retail play in F&O may help banks garner deposits: SBI Chairman Khara
description: It can be noted that concerns over losses incurred by 90 per cent of investors in the derivative trades have led to fears of household savings being blown in speculation rather than being deployed for productive purposes among policymakers.
